RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT ulysses_swoops_icme.HEC_id,ulysses_swoops_icme.time_start,ulysses_swoops_icme.time_end,ulysses_swoops_icme.lat_hgi,ulysses_swoops_icme.long_hgi,ulysses_swoops_icme.r_hgi,ulysses_swoops_icme.v_p,ulysses_swoops_icme.v_p_err,ulysses_swoops_icme.b,ulysses_swoops_icme.b_err FROM ulysses_swoops_icme WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: lat_hgi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The spacecraft heliographic inertial (HGI) latitude at the beginning of the event.

FIELD.name: long_hgi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The spacecraft heliographic inertial (HGI) longitude for the the day in which the event was identified.

FIELD.name: r_hgi
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Ulysses-Sun radial distance using the heliographic inertial (HGI) coordinate system.

FIELD.name: v_p
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Average proton velocity within the event timeframe.

FIELD.name: v_p_err
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Error in the average proton velocity.

FIELD.name: b
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Average total magnetic field strength of the plasma within the event timeframe.

FIELD.name: b_err
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Error in the magnetic field strength.
